languages.text: {n}Склонив голову и ехидно улыбнувшись, техношаман вторит треску вокса:{/n} "Ты говоришь, но Великий Преф не убежден, что должен слушать тебя. Он желает остаться глухим и равнодушным".
{n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and rasps much like the crackling vox,{/n} "You speak, but the Great Pref isn't convinced that he should listen. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."
languages.original_text: {n}Склонив голову и ехидно улыбнувшись, техношаман вторит треску вокса:{/n} "Ты говоришь, но Великий Преф не убежден, что должен слушать тебя. Он желает остаться глухим и равнодушным".

traits.locale_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and says, echoing the crackling of the vox,{/n} "You're talking but the great Pref isn't convinced that he ought to listen to you. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

traits.locale_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and says, echoing the crackling of the vox,{/n} "You're talking but the great Pref isn't convinced that he ought to listen to you. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."

traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}技術祈祷師は頭を低くしてあざけりの笑みを浮かべると、パチパチ音を立てるヴォクスさながらに叫ぶ。{/n}「あなたが伝えたところで、偉大なプレフは聞き入れるべきではないというお考えだ。耳を傾けることも関心を寄せることもない」
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and rasps much like the crackling vox,{/n} "You speak, but the Great Pref isn't convinced that he should listen. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術祈祷師は頭を低くしてあざけりの笑みを浮かべると、パチパチ音を立てるヴォクスさながらに叫ぶ。{/n}「あなたが伝えたところで、偉大なプレフは聞き入れるべきではないというお考えだ。耳を傾けることも関心を寄せることもない」
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}技术萨满低下头，冷笑着，发出了刺耳的声音，仿佛噼啪作响的音阵装置。{/n}“你确实开了口，但伟大的普雷弗觉得他不该听你的话。他选择了充耳不闻，装聋作哑。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and rasps much like the crackling vox,{/n} "You speak, but the Great Pref isn't convinced that he should listen. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术萨满低下头，冷笑着，发出了刺耳的声音，仿佛噼啪作响的音阵装置。{/n}“你确实开了口，但伟大的普雷弗觉得他不该听你的话。他选择了充耳不闻，装聋作哑。”
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Après avoir à nouveau incliné la tête, le technochaman s'autorise un sourire méprisant.{/n} « Vous parlez, mais le grand Pref n'est pas certain de vouloir vous écouter,{n} dit-il d'une voix aussi grinçante que le vox.{/n} Il a décidé de demeurer sourd et indifférent. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and rasps much like the crackling vox,{/n} "You speak, but the Great Pref isn't convinced that he should listen. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir à nouveau incliné la tête, le technochaman s'autorise un sourire méprisant.{/n} « Vous parlez, mais le grand Pref n'est pas certain de vouloir vous écouter,{n} dit-il d'une voix aussi grinçante que le vox.{/n} Il a décidé de demeurer sourd et indifférent. »
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}El tecnochamán baja la cabeza, realiza una mueca y habla con una voz tan ronca como el sonido que proviene del voco chirriante:{/n} «Usted puede hablar, pero el Gran Pref no está tan convencido de que deba escucharlo. Se decanta por permanecer indiferente a sus palabras».
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and rasps much like the crackling vox,{/n} "You speak, but the Great Pref isn't convinced that he should listen. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnochamán baja la cabeza, realiza una mueca y habla con una voz tan ronca como el sonido que proviene del voco chirriante:{/n} «Usted puede hablar, pero el Gran Pref no está tan convencido de que deba escucharlo. Se decanta por permanecer indiferente a sus palabras».
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane neigt den Kopf, verzieht das Gesicht und krächzt wie das knisternde Vox:{/n} "Ihr sprecht, doch der Große Präf ist nicht überzeugt, dass er zuhören sollte. Er entscheidet, taub und gleichgültig zu bleiben."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and rasps much like the crackling vox,{/n} "You speak, but the Great Pref isn't convinced that he should listen. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane neigt den Kopf, verzieht das Gesicht und krächzt wie das knisternde Vox:{/n} "Ihr sprecht, doch der Große Präf ist nicht überzeugt, dass er zuhören sollte. Er entscheidet, taub und gleichgültig zu bleiben."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Tekno şaman; başını eğiyor, küçümseyici bir gülümseme takınıyor ve çatırdayan voksunki kadar kaba bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Sen konuşsan da Ulu Pref, dinlemesi gerektiğine ikna olmuş değil. Sağır ve ilgisiz kalmayı seçiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman bows his head, sneers, and rasps much like the crackling vox,{/n} "You speak, but the Great Pref isn't convinced that he should listen. He chooses to remain deaf and indifferent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno şaman başını eğiyor, küçümseyici bir gülümseme takınıyor ve çatırdayan voksunki kadar kaba bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Konuşuyorsun ancak Ulu Pref dinlemesi gerektiğine ikna olmuş değil. Sağır ve ilgilsiz kalmayı seçiyor."
traits.speaker: TechShaman
